title: golden zed cromo
body: i was in the shop trying to buy the golden zed cromo and the shop was acting up not letting me forge my worlds tokens to the zed cromo now that the shop is working the zed cromo was unavailable and now i can get it and i specifically bought the worlds pass for the cromo can someone at riot take the worlds tokens and give me the cromo i was wanting to buy

replies.body: This content will return to the store  for a Last Chance opportunity around November 16th, hang tight! :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=EAgJfkLE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-01T04:34:00.363+0000)
>
> This content will return to the store  for a Last Chance opportunity around November 16th, hang tight! :)

there is a LOT of post talking about zed state atm and high elo players asking for changing on him that you ignore and u answer things like this? i see what riot games is

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=EAgJfkLE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-01T04:34:00.363+0000)
>
> This content will return to the store  for a Last Chance opportunity around November 16th, hang tight! :)

Thank god, I actually didn't know that they were gonna be replaced with the halloween stuff I just figured that everything would be there til the season ends.
oh thats nice ppl will have their chances to get it the chroma looks good btw

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/WqEZyxTR-someone-please-fix-rengars-missing-particlesit-has-been-2-years
 
Please see us 
Curiously waiting for you {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
